name: Great White Shark
description: Powerful, fast, and precise — the apex predator of the ocean. Known for its massive size and fearsome reputation, the great white is a true marvel of evolution.

name: Hammerhead Shark
description: Easily recognizable by its wide, flat head. This unique shape gives it excellent vision and helps it detect prey hidden under the sand.

name: Whale Shark
description: Despite its size, this gentle giant is a filter feeder that poses no threat to humans. It cruises the warm waters, feeding on plankton and small fish.

name: Tiger Shark
description: Named for the dark stripes on its body, it’s one of the most aggressive species and will eat just about anything.

name: Bull Shark
description: Able to survive in both salt and freshwater, bull sharks are strong, territorial, and often found in rivers and estuaries.
